name: Space Robot: Dodge 'em all
description:
"Space Robot: Dodge 'em all" is my first submission for Mini Jam (#121) and I’m also using Godot 3.5 for the first time.

In this game, you're a little robot floating in a spaceship that has several window leaks and unfriendly robots who wants to push you out . Your objective is to survive all the time that you can.

I designed this videogame having the limitation "Windows as a Mechanic" in mind.

Controls

  • For Mobile:
    • Tap anywhere on the screen to drag and drop your robot far away from the unsafe window while avoiding the other robots at the same time.
  • For Desktop:
    • Click anywhere on the screen to drag and drop your robot far away from the unsafe window while avoiding the other robots at the same time.
